body_html:
Considering that all other flags in setup.py (that even appear right next to this one) are:

  • NO_CUDNN
  • NO_MKLDNN
  • NO_NNPACK
  • NO_DISTRIBUTED
  • NO_SYSTEM_NCCL

Why would we want to change this one to USE_CUDA?
body_text:
Considering that all other flags in setup.py (that even appear right next to this one) are:

NO_CUDNN
NO_MKLDNN
NO_NNPACK
NO_DISTRIBUTED
NO_SYSTEM_NCCL

Why would we want to change this one to USE_CUDA?
body:
Considering that all other flags in `setup.py` (that even appear right next to this one) are:

* NO_CUDNN
* NO_MKLDNN
* NO_NNPACK
* NO_DISTRIBUTED
* NO_SYSTEM_NCCL

Why would we want to change this one to USE_CUDA?
